ValidationRule.description: Specific Outbound Types require a Referral Organisation listed for Completion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Stage__c ,'Completed'), OR( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Outbound_Type__c, 'Transfer Out to Council'), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Outbound_Type__c, 'Transfer Out - To Rescue') ), OR( ISBLANK(animalos__Scheduled_Date_Time__c), ISBLANK(animalos__Referral_Organisation__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must set a Referral Organisation and Schedule Date to Complete this referral.
